text: Dughiar kamɨn Sol akar gavgavim Israelia mɨkeme. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨra uan apanibar osɨmtɨziba ikaragh mɨzazim me gasam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia datɨrɨghɨn daghetam aman kogh mangɨ guaratɨzimɨn tugh. Gumazitam daghetam ameghtɨ God a gasɨghasɨgham.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Israelian gumazitam daghetam amezir puvatɨgha, mɨtiriam bangɨn amɨragha gavgaviba puvatɨ.
